Description of incident: If you shopped at the stores between            November 26, 2003, and October 24, 2005, criminals may have hijacked your            credit and debit card numbers from its computers. Approximately 20,500            of these numbers were obtained from the Fresno store transaction data.            The data included credit and debit card numbers and in some instances            expiration dates and other card data, but did not include customer name            and address.
